topic_reasoning_zh: 图片含桥梁、葡萄摊、户外座椅、日落与月亮，展现惬意的日常出游场景
topic_reasoning_en: Images include bridge, grape stall, outdoor chairs, sunset & moon, showing pleasant daily outing scenes

images.reasoning_zh: 图片含出游兜风文字，展示途中风景，属日常出游时光
images.reasoning_en: The image has outing text and shows scenery en route, related to pleasant daily outings

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示街头卖葡萄场景，与出游时光无直接联系
images.reasoning_en: The picture shows street grape selling, no direct link to outing moments

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示草地上的休闲椅，呈现惬意出游的休息场景
images.reasoning_en: The picture shows leisure chairs on grass, presenting a pleasant outing rest scene

images.reasoning_zh: 图片仅展示风景，无出游相关人物或活动
images.reasoning_en: The picture only shows scenery, no people or outing-related activities

images.reasoning_zh: 仅展示水面波光，无日常出游相关元素
images.reasoning_en: Only shows shimmering water, no elements related to daily outings
